strings.name: Khulna University YouthMappers
strings.extendedDescription: KU students and faculty from multiple disciplines are experienced at creating open data for OSM to address local challenges of development, including food security and other topics.

strings.name: YouthMappers at RUET
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
strings.extendedDescription: The "YouthMappers at RUET" is a humanitarian mapping group of students of Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology (RUET) to share, develop and practice the knowledge of GIS.  This group encourages using open source geospatial data and platform to make solution to reach the most vulnerable group of the world.
